about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Alastria.

Included in your purchase is..

The Base Game -

  • Singleplayer - Travel the world of Alastria in search of mystery, cards and lore. Alastria is a live world so what happens today might not happen tomorrow, seize the day!

  • Multiplayer - Take the cards earned in singleplayer and put them on the line against other players in PvP Multiplayer in the hopes you win a hidden gem of a card.

  • Fuse System - Do you have cards that seem to glow from time to time? Thats an indicator that it can be used with another card to make a more powerful card. However you need to find out what those cards are.

  • Also Included  "The Fall of Austri DLC" Which include a redeemable code for the cards from the tale, the tale itself and an audio version of the tale.

Whats it all about?

CoXistence is a tactical card game based on the characters, events and places in the broad and fictional worlds of Alastria, to which the Tales of CoXistence digital graphic novels are set in.

Loosely based on the mechanics of Triple Triad, CoXistence goes in a different direction, with 8 points of attack, a 4x4 board and a randomized playing field every game. Each player has a hand of 6 cards and will play cards one after another on the board, looking to have the higher attack than your opponent.

Singleplayer gives you the opportunity to earn a strong deck by traversing The world map battling the people of Alastra, the cards earned here can be used in PVP online.

The Worlds of Alastria and beyond

Alastria - We want to create a community that want to be involved in the creative process, bring forward ideas and expand the worlds of Alastria together. Have community competitions and promotions as well as feedback and recognition for loyalty. Having a healthy base is how anything grows and expands and we want you to be a part of it.

Tales of Alastria

You can't have a huge world and not have a bit of lore about the place, here's a free one n purchase of the game you are granted access to the Story Flipbook, Audiobook & a redeem code for the game on launch day!

Alastria has many many secrets and coincidences. You're not paranoid if you're right, someone once said. Who knows how far it goes....?

content_descriptors.notes: A small portion of the cards depict blood and the implication of violence.

name: CoXistence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 series or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No Particular Requirement
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 series or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No Particular Requirement
  • VR Support: N/A

dejus.descriptors:
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Loosely based on Triple Triad mechanics. CoXistence goes in a different direction, with 8 points of attack, a 4x4 board and a randomized playing field every game. Singleplayer is a world map jaunt, in which you can earn cards to strengthen your deck or forge a new one.
